name: Unknown Item
title: Unlocking Bots
event_shop_system: Bots are unlocked and upgraded exclusively through the Event Shop menu using event medals.
unlock_requirements: Bots become available in the Event Shop after certain game progression milestones
Each bot must be unlocked before it can be upgraded
Unlock cost scales based on how many other bots have been purchased

unlock_cost_scaling.strategic_implication: This scaling encourages strategic planning about which bots to unlock first based on your playstyle and current needs.

early_game_priority: Golden Bot: Provides immediate economic benefits
Amplify Bot: Enhances existing damage output
mid_game_priority: Flame Bot: Provides area damage and crowd control
Thunder Bot: Offers strong crowd control capabilities
strategic_synergies: Golden + Amplify: Economic and damage synergy
Thunder + Flame: Crowd control and damage over time
All Bots: Maximum coverage and versatility

post_unlock: Once unlocked, bots can be upgraded using the same Event Shop interface. Each bot has multiple upgrade paths that can be pursued independently based on your strategic priorities.
